metadata.title: AKS Anonymous API Access
metadata.description: Detects API requests made with anonymous authentication.

properties.description: Detects when the Kubernetes API is accessed using anonymous authentication, indicating potential misconfiguration or exploitation.
properties.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where Category == "kube-audit"
| where TimeGenerated > ago(5m)
| extend log = parse_json(log_s)
| extend verb = tostring(log.verb)
| extend objectRef = log.objectRef
| extend user = log.user
| extend sourceIPs = log.sourceIPs
| extend responseStatus = log.responseStatus
| where user.username == "system:anonymous"
| where responseStatus.code in (200, 201, 202, 204)
| extend
    Resource_Type = tostring(objectRef.resource),
    ResourceName = tostring(objectRef.name),
    Namespace = tostring(objectRef.namespace),
    SourceIP = tostring(sourceIPs[0]),
    Verb = verb,
    StatusCode = tostring(responseStatus.code),
    ClusterName = Resource
| project
    TimeGenerated,
    ClusterName,
    Verb,
    Resource_Type,
    ResourceName,
    Namespace,
    SourceIP,
    StatusCode
| summarize
    FirstSeen = min(TimeGenerated),
    LastSeen = max(TimeGenerated),
    RequestCount = count(),
    Verbs = make_set(Verb, 10),
    Resources = make_set(Resource_Type, 20)
    by ClusterName, SourceIP

alertDetailsOverride.alertDescriptionFormat: Anonymous access to Kubernetes API detected from {{SourceIP}} with {{RequestCount}} requests. This indicates a critical security misconfiguration.
